com.vectorprint.configuration.parameters

Interface Parameter<TYPE extends Serializable>

  • Type Parameters:
    TYPE -
    All Superinterfaces:
    Cloneable, Observable, Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BooleanParameter, CharPasswordParameter, ClassParameter, ColorParameter, DoubleArrayParameter, DoubleParameter, FloatArrayParameter, FloatParameter, IntArrayParameter, IntParameter, ParameterImpl, PasswordParameter, RegexParameter, StringArrayParameter, StringParameter, URLParameter

    public interface Parameter<TYPE extends Serializable>
extends Cloneable, Serializable, Observable
    Parameters for a Parameterizable provide help, a key to identify the parameter.
    Author:
    Eduard Drenth at VectorPrint.nl
    See Also:
    ParamAnnotationProcessorImpl, ParameterizableBindingFactory
